c74object.name: fl.uniform~
c74object.digest: Generates frames consisting of a single (uniform) value.
c74object.description: The size of the output is dependent on the mode. The output size may either be set as a parameter, or be set to match that of the triggering input. The value is set with a parameter

entry.name: 0. /value [double]
entry.description: Sets the value to repeat for each output frame.

entry.name: 1. /mode [enum]
entry.description:
Controls how the output length is determined: requested - the output frame size is set by the length parameter. input - the output frame size will match the input size.
[0] - requested [1] - input

entry.name: 2. /length [int]
entry.description: Sets the length of the output when the mode is set to requested. Set in the units specified by the units parameter.

entry.name: 3. /units [enum]
entry.description:
Sets the units for specified output lengths.
[0] - samples [1] - ms [2] - seconds
